stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Hes a really nice guy but an awful teacher. Going into 165 he expects you to remember everything from high school and I didnt at all. Ive never had difficult in school until this class because he barely teaches, he just has you do group work. If you dont really care about getting a good grade then take him!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Professor Scott is a fast teacher and you need to do most of the work outside of class. He gives good feedback and gives you extra credit opportunities. However, if you miss class it\'s hard for you to catch back up. He isn\'t very understanding when you have to miss class. Participation is a big part of your grade!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Lots of homework and every single night. Dry class. Least favorite class this semester. Teacher expects you to know more than you should

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The class structure didn\'t help me or my classmates. Much of the class spent working in groups that weren\'t productive. Half the class was him telling people to quiet down. Every class I wanted to leave as soon as I walked in.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Mr. Scott is nice and funny but doesn\'t really teach very well. If you read the book and do practice online by yourself you will be fine. Lots of group work in class and outside of class. If you are good at learning outside of class and using class as a supplement to your own learning then his classes are great.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Probably one of the best teachers I have had. He gives you lots of extra credit options so if you don\'t do well on exams you can still get a good grade. Really knows his stuff, and he\'s quite funny. Respect class rules, do the work, and you will do well. He\'s very personable, and willing to help.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Expects class participation and every class he will get his clipboard out and ask questions for simple participation points. Take advantage of this. You will have quizzes nearly every class on the homework assigned. Do the Homework! Questions come directly from the HW. A foreign language isn\'t easy. Professor Scott does a great job.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I took this class online, which I think is strange for a language class. I still panic when someone native speaks to me in Spanish. I did my assignments each week, never turned in anything late and did all the extra credit. Prof. Scott gives good feedback on projects. The online format makes it somewhat hard to understand why you missed something.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: One of the more calm and collected professors at OCC. His syllabus outlines everything, and he sticks to it pretty closely. He is a fair grader and doesn\'t really take bs excuses, but if you actually have a legit reason of why something is late ( 90% of students don\'t), he\'s lenient. Didn\'t do work first time, got a B. Retook in Guatemala, got an A

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Took both SPA 101 and 102 with Sr. Scott, and would have continued if he\'d had higher courses! Class style is straightforward and pleasantly predictable. Prof is helpful and very fair, and uses a lot of different fun activities (loved the cultural presentations!). Pro-tip: do the homework, not for the grade, but because the skills build up quickly.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Prof. Scott was a superb teacher. He was always well-prepared, well-organized, very clear in his lectures and in his explanation of grammatical terms. He expected to be serious, but he was always available to help in explaining difficulties. His grading was fair, and his comments on your essays were helpful and coherent.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Mr. Scott is an excellent teacher who does demand a lot of his students. His requirements were clear and fair. In addition, he allowed me to appeal his evaluation of my in class participation and adjusted my grade accordingly. I have been disappointed that I couldn\'t take another class with him. He has my highest recommendation. Great teacher!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Prof. Scott is a strict but completely fair teacher. His directions and due dates were all clear - they are listed in the syllabus! There is work to be done and you have to do it, not just to get the grade, but to learn the language. He inspired me to keep learning Spanish. Definitely a great class!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Mr. Scott is a cool guy but I don\'t feel as though I learned a whole lot of Spanish in his class. Online homework can get a bit extensive and the homework program doesn\'t teach the language very well. He hardly touched on how to properly conjugate verbs which left many students confused when it came to tests.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Good teacher easy to get a good grade in his level 200 classes if u go to class attempt your hw and do your little essays and u will get a b no matter what.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I think that he is a great teacher! If you actually come to class anddo the work, you should have no problem in his class. He is very helpful if you ask for it too. You must be very proactive if you take his class and always remember to bring your tect book! It\'s also a bonus that he happens to be kind and understanding! :)

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Scott is a wonderful teacher, as long as you come to class, do the work and study you will do fine.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Scott was awful. He had it out for me and refused to give me a good grade for anything. He marked everything late, when it was not or he gave me partial credit. His voice was terrible to listen to and he was a wanna-be Spanish man. DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!!!!!!!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Like everyone has said before, his class isn\'t easy if you don\'t put in the effort. But if you do, and actually study and do the work, it\'s quite easy. Very interesting teacher. Knows his stuff. Plus he puts everything he uses online, which is very resourceful when studying for a test. Only thing that was hard was that he didn\'t announce due dates.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)
comments: not an easy A. like the comment before said, if you\'re a slacker, dont take his class because its not "show up and get an A". otherwise hes a good teacher and teaches alot about the spanish culture along with the language which was interesting.
